Activity: Arrive at the hospital, log in, and check emails. Check for any updates or requests from @da-1 or @da-2 regarding data entry or reporting needs. Reply to emails.
Review the goals for the week. Reflect on my performance and identify areas where I can improve. Think about weekend plan.
Review patient schedule and patient charts, preparing for the final day of assessments for the week.
Begin patient assessments, ensuring all patients are accurately assessed for influenza symptoms and their data is entered into the EHR.
Enter patient data into the EHR.
Lunch break. Make weekend plans with colleagues.
Continue patient assessments and EHR data entry, ensuring all data is complete and accurate.
Before the end of my shift, take the time to check the interesting websites.
Prepare for shift handover, providing a comprehensive overview of all patients assessed and their EHR data. @rn-1 and @rn-3 for shift handover.
Log out and leave for the weekend.
